title: Medical Personnel Readiness
description: A hospital ship commander needs to verify that all medical staff have the required certifications and immunizations for an upcoming humanitarian mission.

tasks.description: Query the medical personnel database for the records of all staff assigned to the ship.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander retrieves all relevant personnel records.

tasks.description: Identify any staff with expired certifications or missing immunizations required for the destination country.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander generates a list of all medical readiness deficiencies.

tasks.description: Schedule the necessary training and immunizations to ensure the entire medical staff is 100% ready for the mission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander creates an actionable plan to resolve all readiness issues.
